about.title: About
about.body: Mechanical engineer with 8+ years delivering robust components and assemblies for industrial machinery, mobility, and energy systems. I combine CAD, FEM, and prototyping with supplier coordination to release manufacturable designs on time. I enjoy translating requirements into clear drawings, validating with simulation, and driving continuous improvement on the shop floor.
